All good on this one. I have updated the query "Leep Tags - Leep Projects"

Yes, for some reason the "ajax" filter doesn't work with custom query.
https://www.msaustralia.org.au/leep/projects/

Hi Joel

The filter AJAX filter is working, but the listing is displaying different pages, not from the original query. But once I click on any filter, it will display the categorised filtered items correctly.

I noticed that you replaced the listing with Leep Projects Loop - v2, but using post source instead of query?

Thanks
Karlo
